__e: That's what he said about Alfred, wasn't it?
When you called Alfred... it wasn't your voice, it was God's voice!
If Alfred didn't kill your son, who do you think did?
Alfred's the only man I know who isn't waiting for me to save him.
No, Alfred, it's my father's house.
Alfred, that is exactly what i wanted to hear from you.
You don't give a damn about Alfred, and you sure as hell don't care about me.
Now, some of you may ask, why send Alfred and not his older brother?
Everyone thinks I was with Alfred and that's why you killed him.
Or why alfred, your father's partner, who barely knew you Took such an interest in your life?
What's gonna become of us if you go on this way?
- Oh, Alfred, what is the matter with you?
